name: Big Boss Jump Free
description:
When you're the boss, everyday is crazy busy! Work, work work - it feels like your jumping from one thing to the next.

Big Boss Jump is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Choose your boss character and keep making that cash to avoid falling behind. Don't get nailed by all those distractions out there!

Collect cash and power-ups along the way to help you out, or unlock other bosses for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect cash to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Big Boss Jump right now while it's 100% FREE!
